short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension for Fiverr and Upwork that helps you reply to user chats and write job-winning proposals on Upwork

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Introducing a secure Chrome extension for both Fiverr and Upwork, designed to enhance your communication efficiency. This tool enables you to craft responses to user chats with precision and generate proposals for Upwork, offering a range of tones tailored to various scenarios. Whether negotiating, seeking more information, or confirming terms, our extension ensures your replies are appropriate and impactful, helping you stand out in client interactions.
